H0.text: Which actor played Michael Corleone in the Godfather series of films. Marlon Brando

H1.text: Which actor played Michael Corleone in the Godfather series of films. Robert De Niro

H2.text: Which actor played Michael Corleone in the Godfather series of films. James Caan

H3.text: Which actor played Michael Corleone in the Godfather series of films. Pacino

A4.text: Francis Ford Coppola cast him as Michael Corleone in what became a blockbuster Mafia film, The Godfather (1972).

A5.text: In 1974, Pacino reprised his role as Michael Corleone in The Godfather Part II, which was the first sequel to win the Best Picture Oscar
